name: 10 Tac Toe
description:
Prepare to experience tic tac toe in a way like never before, this fun and innovative game will have you playing nonstop!

Introducing the epic capture game mode! Place 3 tokens in a row and you get to capture one of your opponent's tokens! Capture 4 of their tokens and you win! Be careful not to get captured yourself though!

Play online against friends or other players no matter what device they have, cross platform play is supported!

Simple game mode lets you challenge opponents to an exciting game of chance and wit!
Take your chances on a roll to get an advantageous position or move to block your opponent from getting a winning combination! Make the best decision and claim your victory!

Play simple or capture game mode with 3 players!

This is the full version of the game, it contains simple, 3 player simple, capture, 3 player capture, and online game modes.
